itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, June 11, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, June 11, 2013
description: The use of government contractors involved in surveillance work has grown tremendously since 9/11. We take a loook at how big the business has become. And we visit another business that's growing: E-cigarettes. Finally, can money and planning stop severe flooding in Europe?
teaser: The use of government contractors involved in surveillance work has grown tremendously since 9/11. We take a loook at how big the business has become. And we visit another business that's growing: E-cigarettes. Finally, can money and planning stop severe flooding in Europe?
byline: David Brancaccio, Shannon Mullen, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Stacey Vanek Smith, Molly Wood, Bruce Johnson, Sara Evans, Mark Garrison and Johnny Niemann
